title: The United World: The United World 1
description: How far will a united government go to impose utopia?January 1st, 2020 saw not only the beginning of a new decade but also the forming of a worldwide government.A year into the new regime, London lovebirds John and Nora welcome a baby into their lives. But when John discovers what the doctor is trying to do to their child, they flee - away from the hospital, and the overbearing eyes of the state.As the government gathers momentum, the full horrors of their plans emerge. Can John save his family from the oppressive shackles of The United World?
author: Craig Priestley
